## SQLDialect.stringLiteral() method

Get SQL string literal for the specified value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stringLiteral(val: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | <code>string</code> | String value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

SQL value expression that represents the provided string value.
